attributes.action: HOLD A REFERENDUM ON THE RECENT EU REFORM TREATY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU was rebuffed by referenda in France and The Netherlands. Now they circumvent referenda and our government is complicit in that. Why do politicians think that they can so abuse their countrymen?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
